column1: Trecate is a comune (municipality) in the Province of Novara in the Italian region Piedmont
column2: located about 90 kilometres (56 mi) northeast of Turin and about 9 kilometres (6 mi) east of Novara.

column1: It harbors a major refinery complex for fuels and liquefied petroleum gas (LPG)
It is served by Trecate railway station.
Santa Maria Assunta - main parish church
San Francesco - Contains frescoes by il Cerano
Sanctuary of the Madonna delle Grazie
